mapper.select: select config_id AS configId, config_key AS configKey, config_val AS configVal, function_id AS functionId, note AS note from config where customer_id=#{customerId}

SELECT t2.organization_id k, t1.organization_id v FROM dim_organization t1, (SELECT t.full_path,t.organization_id FROM dim_organization t WHERE t.customer_id = #{customerId}) t2 WHERE locate(t2.full_path, t1.full_path) AND t1.customer_id = #{customerId}

SELECT t1.organization_id k, concat(t2.organization_id, "," ,t2.organization_key, "," ,t2.organization_name) v FROM dim_organization t1 INNER JOIN dim_organization t2 on t1.organization_id = t2.organization_parent_id AND t1.customer_id = t2.customer_id LEFT JOIN dim_organization_type dot ON dot.organization_type_id = t1.organization_type_id WHERE t1.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY dot.organization_type_level
SELECT function_id functionId, function_name functionName, url FROM `dim_function` WHERE is_menu = 0 and customer_id =#{customerId}
SELECT sequence_id itemId, curt_name prefix, sequence_name itemName FROM dim_sequence WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY show_index
SELECT sequence_sub_id subId, curt_name curtName, sequence_sub_name itemName FROM dim_sequence_sub WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY show_index
SELECT da.ability_id AS k, da.ability_name AS v FROM dim_ability da WHERE da.customer_id = #{customerId} AND da.type = 0 ORDER BY da.show_index
SELECT da.ability_id AS k, da.ability_name AS v FROM dim_ability da WHERE da.customer_id = #{customerId} AND da.type = 1 ORDER BY da.show_index
SELECT ability_key FROM dim_ability WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} GROUP BY ability_key
SELECT position_id k, position_name v FROM `dim_position` where customer_id =#{customerId}

SELECT organization_id k, organization_name v FROM `dim_organization` t INNER JOIN dim_organization_type t2 on t.organization_type_id = t2.organization_type_id WHERE t.customer_id =#{customerId} ORDER BY t2.organization_type_level
SELECT performance_id k, performance_name v FROM `dim_performance` t WHERE t.customer_id =#{customerId} ORDER BY t.show_index
SELECT ability_lv_id k, ability_lv_name v FROM `dim_ability_lv` t WHERE t.customer_id =#{customerId} ORDER BY t.show_index
SELECT job_title_id k, job_title_name v FROM `dim_job_title` t WHERE t.customer_id =#{customerId} ORDER BY t.show_index
SELECT city_id k, city_name v FROM `dim_city` t WHERE t.customer_id =#{customerId} ORDER BY t.show_index

SELECT t.`channel_id` AS k, t.`channel_name` AS v FROM dim_channel t 1=1
and t.customer_id = #{customerId}
